value.title: Why the complete version of Tesla Full Self-Driving will take longer than Elon Musk says it will
value.excerpt: Driving, or FSD, today for $8,000, but it's not feature complete. CNBC explores why the complete version of FSD has yet to be released.

value.title: Tech Startup Funding Declines as Pandemic Drags On
value.excerpt: Venture-capital funding for U.S. startups declined in the first half of the year, threatening a key source of information-technology innovation for larger companies.

value.title: Elon Musk on Tesla Self-Driving: ‘I can almost go from my house to work with no intervention’
value.excerpt: Elon Musk said that he is testing Tesla’s latest alpha built of its self-driving system and claim that he can “almost” go from his house to work without intervention. Last year, Musk announced Tesla’s plan to deploy 1 million “Robotaxi” vehicles for a self-driving ride-sharing network by the end of 2020.

value.title: FCA, Waymo team up on Level 4 self-driving commercial vehicles
value.excerpt: Google's experts will work on autonomous commercial vehicles exclusively with Fiat Chrysler. FCA will also use Waymo self-driving tech across its brands.

value.title: In An Industry First, Plus.AI To Submit Their Self-Driving Trucks To Independent Testing
value.excerpt: Self-driving truck developer Plus.ai announced today they have finalized an agreement with the Transportation Research Center to conduct rigorous independent testing of their Automated Driving System in realistic conditions.

value.title: Slow progress on self-driving is putting startups in a bind
value.excerpt: Progress on self-driving technology has been slower than many people expected just a few years ago. Google's Waymo was aiming to launch a fully driverless taxi service by the end of 2018 but missed its deadline.

value.title: How NASA Built a Self-Driving Car for Its Next Mars Mission

value.title: Aurora expands to Texas in bid to ramp up self-driving truck efforts
value.excerpt: Aurora, the autonomous vehicle technology startup backed by Amazon, is expanding into Texas as it aims to accelerate the development self-driving trucks. value.title: Former Ford President Joins Self-Driving Radar Startup’s Board
value.excerpt: Joe Hinrichs, a former top executive at Ford Motor Co. who left the company earlier this year, is making a tentative return to the auto industry by joining the board of a startup developing technology for self-driving cars and driver-assistance features.

value.title: Intel's Mobileye will test self-driving cars at up to 80 MPH in Germany
value.excerpt: Intel’s Mobileye self-driving division has received regulatory approval to test its vehicles on German roads, Intel announced.

value.title: 5 Ways Self-Driving Cars Could Make Our World (And Our Lives) Better
value.excerpt: Progress towards more autonomous and self-driving cars is fast. Here we look at the benefits of self-driving cars and how they could make our lives and our world better.

value.title: German courts rule against Tesla's "self driving" claims
value.excerpt: Electric car brand Tesla has been banned from making claims that its cars have “self-driving” technology, by a court in Munich.

value.title: UAE open to work closely with Tesla on driverless cars, says minister

value.title: BALTIC BLOG: Estonian Al law lags behind self-driving vehicles
value.excerpt: A collision between a passenger vehicle and a self-driving bus in the Estonian capital puzzled the local transportation authority, which was suddenly faced with the questions of how to regulate driverless AI-based traffic and avoid accidents.

value.title: Navistar teams up with TuSimple to produce self-driving trucks by 2024
value.excerpt: Navistar and TuSimple deepened their two-year relationship on Wednesday, announcing plans to develop and begin producing autonomous semi trucks by 2024. The strategic partnership includes Navistar taking an undisclosed stake in self-driving trucks startup TuSimple.

value.title: Navistar to develop self-driving trucks with TuSimple
value.excerpt: Truck maker Navistar International Corp has bought a minority stake in TuSimple and aims to co-develop self-driving trucks by 2024 with the technology company as it rolls out a national U.S. autonomous freight network,

value.title: 'Hands free': Automakers race to next level of not quite self-driving cars
value.excerpt: Automakers have many names for new systems that allow for hands-free driving, but no safety or performance standards to follow as they roll out the most significant changes to vehicle technology in a generation.

value.title: German Court Says Tesla Self-Driving Claims Are Misleading
value.excerpt: Tesla’s plans to steal buyers from German luxury automakers suffered a setback Tuesday after a court in Munich ruled that the California maker of electric cars made exaggerated promises about its autonomous driving technology.

value.title: Tesla's approach to self-driving technology is completely different from its rivals. See how it works.
value.excerpt: Tesla CEO Elon Musk is confident; last week, he said Tesla could achieve "level five" autonomy this year — meaning no human intervention required.

value.title: AI for self-driving cars doesn’t account for crime
value.excerpt: Because today’s simplistic ethical considerations in AI and autonomous vehicles don’t account for malicious intent, vigorous driving simulation testing is required.
